column2: What response best decribes you falling asleep over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = I never take longer than 30 minutes to fall asleep.
column18: 1 = I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, less than half the time.
column19: 2 = I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time.
column20: 3 = I take more than 60 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time.

column2: What response best decribes your sleep during the night over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = I do not wake up at night.
column18: 1 = I have a restless, light sleep with a few brief awakenings each night.
column19: 2 = I wake up at least once a night, but I go back to sleep easily.
column20: 3 = I awaken more than once a night and stay awake for 20 minutes or more, more than half the time.

column2: What response best decribes you waking up too early over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = Most of the time, I awaken no more than 30 minutes before I need to get up.
column18: 1 = More than half the time, I awaken more than 30 minutes before I need to get up.
column19: 2 =  I almost always awaken at least one hour or so before I need to, but I go back to sleep eventually.
column20: 3 = I awaken at least one hour before I need to, and can't go back to sleep.

column2: What response best decribes you sleeping too much over the past seven days?
column17: 0 =  I sleep no longer than 7ÔøΩ8 hours/night, without napping during the day.
column18: 1 =  I sleep no longer than 10 hours in a 24-hour period including naps.
column19: 2 = I sleep no longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps.
column20: 3 = I sleep longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps.

column2: What response best decribes you feeling sad over the past seven days?
column18: 1 =  I feel sad less than half the time.
column19: 2 = I feel sad more than half the time.
column20: 3 = I feel sad nearly all of the time.

column2: What response best decribes you have decreased appetite over the past seven days?
column17: 0 =  There is no change in my usual appetite.
column18: 1 =  I eat somewhat less often or lesser amounts of food than usual.
column19: 2 =  I eat much less than usual and only with personal effort.
column20: 3 = I rarely eat within a 24-hour period, and only with extreme personal effort or when others persuade me to eat.

column2: What response best decribes you have increased appetite over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = There is no change from my usual appetite.
column18: 1 = I feel a need to eat more frequently than usual.
column19: 2 =  I regularly eat more often and/or greater amounts of food than usual.
column20: 3 = I feel driven to overeat both at mealtime and between meals.

column2: What response best decribes you have decreased weight over the past two weeks?
column17: 0 = I have not had a change in my weight.
column18: 1 = I feel as if I've had a slight weight loss.
column19: 2 = I have lost 2 pounds or more.
column20: 3 = I have lost 5 pounds or more.

column2: What response best decribes you increased weight over the past two weeks?
column17: 0 = I have not had a change in my weight.
column18: 1 = I feel as if I've had a slight weight gain.
column19: 2 = I have gained 2 pounds or more.
column20: 3 = I have gained 5 pounds or more.

column2: What response best decribes you concentration/decision making over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = There is no change in my usual capacity to concentrate or make decisions.
column18: 1 = I occasionally feel indecisive or find that my attention wanders.
column19: 2 = Most of the time, I struggle to focus my attention or to make decisions.
column20: 3 = I cannot concentrate well enough to read or cannot make even minor decisions.

column2: What response best decribes your view of yourself over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = I see myself as equally worthwhile and deserving as other people.
column18: 1 = I am more self-blaming than usual.
column19: 2 = I largely believe that I cause problems for others.
column20: 3 = I think almost constantly about major and minor defects in myself.

column2: What response best decribes your thoughts of death or suicide over the past seven days?
column17: 0  = I do not think of suicide or death.
column18: 1 = I feel that life is empty or wonder if it's worth living.
column19: 2 = I think of suicide or death several times a week for several minutes.
column20: 3 = I think of suicide or death several times a day in some detail, or I have made specific plans for suicide or have actually tried to take my life.

column2: What response best decribes your general Interest over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = There is no change from usual in how interested I am in other people or activities.
column18: 1 = I notice that I am less interested in people or activities.
column19: 2 = I find I have interest in only one or two of my formerly pursued activities.
column20: 3 = I have virtually no interest in formerly pursued activities.

column2: What response best decribes your energy Level over the past seven days?
column17: 0 = There is no change in my usual level of energy.
column18: 1 = I get tired more easily than usual.
column19: 2 = I have to make a big effort to start or finish my usual daily activities (for example, shopping, homework, cooking, or going to work).
column20: 3 = I really cannot carry out most of my usual daily activities because I just don't have the energy.

column2: What response best decribes you feeling slowed down over the past seven days?
column17: 0 =  I think, speak, and move at my usual rate of speed.
column18: 1 = I find that my thinking is slowed down or my voice sounds dull or flat.
column19: 2 = It takes me several seconds to respond to most questions and I'm sure my thinking is slowed.
column20: 3 = I am often unable to respond to questions without extreme effort.

column2: What response best decribes you feeling restless over the past seven days?
column18: 1 = I'm often fidgety, wringing my hands, or need to shift how I am sitting.
column19: 2 = I have impulses to move about and am quite restless.
column20: 3 =  At times, I am unable to stay seated and need to pace around.
